TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplacingExpressionVisitor extends System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor

summary.para: An expression visitor that replaces one expression with another in given expression tree.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions and How EF Core queries work for more information and examples.
